known_issues: App shows notification: "Połączenie z serwerem jest niedostępne. Sprawdź połączenie internetowe." despite good internet connection (likely backend/preview connectivity issue).

existing_features.title: Add a lightweight backend health-check method and use it to confirm real connectivity (instead of relying only on actor creation) so the app does not show a false “server unavailable” warning when the user’s internet is fine.
Improve the connection banner UX to reduce false positives and provide recovery controls.
Ensure network/actor-related error messages displayed to end users are in English for connectivity failures and are consistent with the connection banner wording.
Produce a clean rebuild/redeploy that compiles successfully and does not regress loading of Public and Admin pages.
